text: smoke testing of our soft launch candidate is going to happen this morning from 10-11 in the social space, mo/dimitry will be coordinating as i’ll be out of pocket at the time
Friend of mine/Uncorked that ran for state legislature in Mass and lost by a few hundred votes. He’s connected to a few DNC folks

attachments.title: Mike Bloomberg
attachments.text: Michael Bloomberg Campaign for Massachusetts State from Pittsfield.

text: <@U243UT96G> can you share the ziba designs with Melissa? I’ve asked her to take some time this afternoon just to see if we have any UX perspective feedback we should bring back.

<@U06DFL7BP> we’re gonna have another round of testing internally on monday, shooting for 11 am, and this one will include Tara/Emma + potentially some Ziba folks. any thoughts on who could join us for that effort?
pretty much a replay of what we did this morning

also goal is to open up the site to a group of ~ 20 - 30 testers on monday, sharing with them known bugs and getting feedback from all. trying to strategize on how best to do that - i’m thinking that spreadsheet could be just the trick but do you have any other suggestions?
